column3:

column4:

column5:
<color=yellow>Lanza</color> : 
   - Not one but two bodies 
   - The second Body was a prostitute 
   - He thinks that they couldn't kill each other
column6: - <color=yellow>Giovanni</color> was made capo some months ago \n   - His family is under the mob protection \n
column7:
- <color=yellow>Giovanni</color> was not really good in his job 
   - He has no family except his mother 
   - The mother live in Sicily 
   - He came in America alone
column8: - Not sure if the second body realy was a prostitute \n   - <color=yellow>Giovanni</color> was a gentleman then no reasons for her to murder him \n
column9: - No one has ever seen them together before \n
column10: - The killer shot <color=yellow>Giovanni</color> right in the forehead \nWhat is this poker chip ? \n
column11:
- Finally the second body really seems to be a prostitute 
   - They were not killed in the same way 
   - The prostitute throat was cut off 
   - There is a key in her bag 
   - The key is for a hotelroom
column12:
- The bedroom was not often used 
   - This room is tidy and the bed is made 
   - Too few clothes for someone like <color=yellow>Giovanni</color> 
There is already something wrong.
column13:
The prostitute apartment : 
   - The girl lived in a shabby hotel 
   - She smoked 
   - Her stuffs proves that she was a prostitute 
   - She corresponded with her sister 
   - Her first name was <color=yellow>Margaret</color> 
   - Her nickname was <color=yellow>Maggy</color> 
She is my only lead.
